body:
Yeah, KikiMaloo was stolen, so I just wanted my friends and my teammates to know I changed to KikiV2 (best Nickname ever :v) and that guy's me, also I wanted to see if I can delete this account from Avicus Network (?) that's pretty much it.

Conclusion: Free Optifine capes are scams u.u

title: This account got stolen :'v

replies.body:
I've banned this account so you won't get into any trouble if the person who has is not logs in. I recommend changing any password that is the same as the one you used for minecraft.

This should be a lesson to everyone that if something seems to good to be true, it usually is.

replies.body:
Way to recover the account 100% works
here  https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/361380

You have to show the purchase trancision id
Talk to mojang and they will send you all the info of your account
To retrieve it
